data.title: definition and meaning
data.text:
This follows on word this morning that Joss Whedon might be in the running for the film, and while his filmic sensibility certainly seems more in line with the project in some ways, not to mention the fact that Whedon was a writer on the comic, Sollett may be the one in better proximity to direct.

Peter Sollett to Direct Marvel’s Runaways? | /Film 2010

If Sollett directed this and they got a really great screeenwriter on board, this could be really exciting.

Peter Sollett to Direct Marvel’s Runaways? | /Film 2010

I suppose if The Runaways is really meant to be “The Breakfast Club with superheroes,” as Deadline refers to it, then Sollett makes a certain sense.

Peter Sollett to Direct Marvel’s Runaways? | /Film 2010

Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist is directed by indie filmmaker Peter Sollett, of only Raising Victor Vargas previously, while the screenplay was written by newcomer Lorene Scafaria.

Must Watch: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist Trailer « FirstShowing.net 2008

"Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist is directed by indie filmmaker Peter Sollett, of only Raising Victor Vargas previously," except, he directed Five Feet High and Rising as well.

First Teaser Poster for Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist « FirstShowing.net 2008

Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist is directed by indie filmmaker Peter Sollett, of only Raising Victor Vargas previously, while the screenplay was written by newcomer Lorene Scafaria.

First Teaser Poster for Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist « FirstShowing.net 2008

They've brought in Peter Sollett, director of "Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist," to rewrite Jon Hartmere's script, and hired musical movie veterans Craig Zadan and Neil Meron to come aborad as producers.

Zac Efron’s ‘Footloose’ Heads Towards The Dance Floor » MTV Movies Blog 2008

Sollett will be adding a few new songs "that will complement some of the memorable original tunes."

Zac Efron Headlining Footloose Revamp for Paramount « FirstShowing.net 2008

One of those filmmakers included Peter Sollett, who directed the independent film " Raising Victor Vargas ," Rasuk's breakout performance.

The Full Feed from HuffingtonPost.com The Huffington Post News Editors 2011
